channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: 10 Movies With Hilariously Retro Technology
item.dc:creator: Mark McPherson
item.description: These are the films with tech so dated they’re kinda cute in all their speculative glory.
item.content:encoded: Watching old movies can give us a snapshot not just of the era, but also of what old films considered innovative and modern. While dated clothing is always a lark, old tech has a certain charm. If you’re a geek and, I mean, look at the website you’re on, you’re probably fascinated anytime a CRT monitor or DOS-style prompt populates an older movie, whether you lived through that era or not.

item.title: Should You Wait for the iPhone 18, 18 Pro, or Foldable iPhone?
item.dc:creator: Tim Brookes
item.description: There will always be a better iPhone just around the corner.
item.content:encoded: The iPhone 17 is here, with a brand new slim model and the usual feature-rich Pro models in tow. Now is the perfect time to think about what next year holds, especially if you’re weighing up whether or not this year’s upgrade is worth it.

item.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Review: Better Than Expected
item.dc:creator: Cory Gunther
item.description: The Pixel 10 Pro and Pro XL are Google's most complete phone yet, and better than I expected.
item.content:encoded: The software experience has long been the main selling point of a Google Pixel phone. That all changed last year with the Pixel 9 Pro, and Google's done it again with the new Pixel 10 Pro and Pixel 10 Pro XL. This is Google's most complete phone yet, with fantastic hardware, software, and performance.

item.title: Apple's New Watch Ultra 3 Has a Big Battery Upgrade
item.dc:creator: Arol Wright
item.content:encoded: Apple's Watch Ultra range is weird, but if you have the dough and you need a watch that can withstand a lifestyle even more active than yours, it's probably well worth the investment. Apple has just launched the latest Apple Watch Ultra 3 in addition to a new Apple Watch SE, and both are pretty decent upgrades.

item.title: 5 Classic Movies I Watched Too Young: Dark Themes & Childhood Trauma
item.dc:creator: Sydney Butler
item.content:encoded: Being born in the late 80s, I had the privilege of growing up with some of the best films ever made. My earliest memories are of watching Spielberg's ET and other masterpieces of the era.

item.title: This Is Why Your Router Dies Too Soon
item.dc:creator: Sydney Butler
item.description: Discover the silent killers threatening to destroy your Wi-Fi router.
item.content:encoded: We all need at least one router, and probably more than that with large homes and smart devices everywhere. Buying a router or mesh system isn't cheap either, so you want that gear to last as long as possible.

item.title: The iPhone 17 Series Is Here, Including the iPhone Air
item.dc:creator: Corbin Davenport
item.description: Regular, Pro, Pro Max, and... Air?
item.content:encoded: After months of rumors and speculation, Apple has finally revealed the iPhone 17, iPhone Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max. ProMotion and always-on display are finally coming to the base iPhone, and all models are getting an improved front-facing camera and other improvements.

item.title: How to Cause Windows to Show a Blue Screen of Death with One File
item.dc:creator: Aman Kumar
item.description: Mini in size, mega in impact!
item.content:encoded: Windows mostly crash due to faulty RAM or some other hardware issue, but what if I tell you that a simple file of just a few KB can also crash your system and leave you with a BSOD screen? I’m talking about the OSDATA file. Here's everything you need to know about it.

item.title: The Nissan Z NISMO’s New Upgrade Fixes Its Biggest Flaw
item.dc:creator: Tyler Dupont
item.description: The Nissan Z NISMO is receiving a key upgrade that finally fixes its biggest flaw, boosting performance and driver appeal.
item.content:encoded: The Nissan Z NISMO has always been positioned as the ultimate expression of Nissan’s legendary sports car lineage. With its aggressive styling, tuned suspension, and track-focused upgrades, it delivers plenty of performance to back up its bold looks. Yet for many enthusiasts, there has always been one glaring omission that kept it from feeling like the complete package.

item.title: I Finally Found the Best iPhone Weather Widget
item.dc:creator: Bryan M. Wolfe
item.description: Simplicity and elegance combine in my new favorite weather app discovery.
item.content:encoded: Over the years, I have tried numerous weather apps for my iPhone, but I could never find the right one until now. I spent a lot of time trying out various apps only to get frustrated with limited customization, overwhelming amounts of information, and pesky in-app ads.
